sense.def:
Kadar ena stvar
merges with another
ali
is merged with another
, se dve stvari povežeta v nekaj večjega.

seg.quote: They advised their clients to merge with another company.
The borough of Holborn was merged with St Pancras and Hampstead.
The voices merged with one another.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
merges into the darkness
ali
into the background
, tistega ne moremo več razločno videti ali razločiti od ozadja.

seg.quote: They were painted so that they would merge into the landscape.
